text: I can't find any mention of why one ought to avoid doing so in either the performance or workflow tips portions of the manual, and it's maybe the most common pitfall for experienced programmers coming from other languages

elements.text: I can't find any mention of why one ought to avoid doing so in either the performance or workflow tips portions of the manual, and it's maybe the most common pitfall for experienced programmers coming from other languages

text:
It would be good to add this to the manual. See for example:
1. <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/37663|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/37663>
2. <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/38052|https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/38052>
